name: DodgeSaw
description:
DODGESAW is a top down shooter OOZING with an 80's retro synthwave style and RADICAL over-the-top action

Destroy enemies and collect energy shards to fill up your Supernova meter.

But be warned - killing enemies causes them to release all sorts of surprises! Good and bad.

Once your Supernova is filled, press "F" to unleash a devastating attack!

Can you survive all 3 levels?

DodgeSaw is set in the same universe as Crossfire (Wishlist on steam)

Controls:

  1. WASD to move
  2. Left Click to fire
  3. Space or RMB to use Slow motion
  4. Shift to dash (Unlocked at level 2)
  5. Hold Escape for 1.5 sec to quit

Credits:

Code, Art & Design by Seet & Axolet

Sound and music assets used are licensed by CC0
